Text:
The last time I downloaded one of NY2 dsr video's it was very poor quality.
Is the quality of this one any good?

not the best resolution, but quality and framerate is good. definitely watchable.
video is not deinterlaced so I recommend VLC for on-the-fly deinterlacing

What's the bps & resolution?

Thanks for the upload q2323

To answer my own question, after download it I see it is 608 X 352 with 29fps and 1100 bit rate. Good specs.
I see what you mean about needing de-interlacing.
Decent enough to watch since you never seem to find this show in HD anywhere.
